title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 01, 2016  July 1, 2016 - Discontinue Sales of Senior Interagency Passes  Weir Farm National Historic Site to Discontinue Sales of Senior Interagency Passes   September 02, 2015  Weir Farm National Historic Site Welcomes 4th Grade Students Through Every Kid In a Park Initiative  Weir Farm National Historic Site invites all 4th grade students to visit the park as part of the White Houseâ€™s new Every Kid in a Park program. Starting September 1, 4th grade students can go to www.everykidinapark.gov to complete an activity and obtain a voucher for a free annual entry pass to more than 2,000 federal recreation areas, including national parks.
